description: This file defines function prototypes for managing Wi-Fi interface parameters, radio interface statistics, neighbor access points, and harvester initialization in a network device. It primarily contains function declarations for get/set operations of various Wi-Fi and radio parameters, including validation, commit, and rollback functions, indicating it serves as an interface or API header for hardware abstraction or configuration.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_Default_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for default Wi-Fi device settings.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_Default_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for default Wi-Fi device settings.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for Wi-Fi device.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for Wi-Fi device.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for Wi-Fi device.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for Wi-Fi device.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for Wi-Fi device.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_Commit
methods.description: Commits changes to Wi-Fi interface parameters.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_Validate
methods.description: Validates Wi-Fi interface parameters before committing.

methods.name: InterfaceDevicesWifi_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to Wi-Fi interface parameters.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_Default_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves default radio interface statistics ULONG value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_Default_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets default radio interface statistics ULONG value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves radio interface statistics ULONG value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets radio interface statistics ULONG value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves radio interface statistics string value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves radio interface statistics boolean value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets radio interface statistics boolean value.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_Commit
methods.description: Commits changes to radio interface statistics.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_Validate
methods.description: Validates radio interface statistics parameters.

methods.name: RadioInterfaceStatistics_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to radio interface statistics.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_Default_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves default neighbor access point ULONG value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_Default_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets default neighbor access point ULONG value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves neighbor access point ULONG value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets neighbor access point Ulong value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves neighbor access point string value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves neighbor access point boolean value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets neighbor access point boolean value.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_Commit
methods.description: Commits changes to neighbor access point parameters.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_Validate
methods.description: Validates neighbor access point parameters.

methods.name: NeighboringAP_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to neighbor access point parameters.

methods.name: CosaDmlHarvesterInit
methods.description: Initializes the harvester component.
